items.text: Check-in start time: 3 PM; Check-in end time: 5:30 AM
Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival
Credit card, debit card, or cash deposit required for incidental charges
Government-issued photo ID may be required
Children stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding
Free WiFi and wired internet access in public areas
Wheelchair-accessible parking and van parking on site

address.addressLine: 13313 North Stemmons Free, Farmers Branch, TX, 75234

editorial.title: Farmers Branch
content: Located in Farmers Branch, Arya Inn & Suites Farmers Branch is in the business district and near theme parks. Sixth Floor Museum and Perot Museum of Nature and Science are cultural highlights, and some of the area's popular attractions include Zero Gravity Thrill Amusement Park and Dallas World Aquarium. Looking to enjoy an event or a game while in town? See what's going on at American Airlines Center, or consider a night out at South Side Ballroom.

content.text: At Arya Inn & Suites Farmers Branch, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of American Airlines Center and Galleria Dallas. Guests can take a dip in the outdoor pool, and freebies like WiFi and self parking are added perks. Also, Dallas Market Center and Gaylord Texan Convention Center are within a short drive. Fellow travelers love the overall property condition. The property is just a short walk to public transportation: Farmers Branch Station is 9 minutes away.

content.text: • Rollaway beds are available for USD 30.0 per day

This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.

Disinfectant is used to clean the property, and commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays.

Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; masks are required in public areas.

Contactless check-out is available.

Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast.

Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 24 hours between bookings.

This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global).
